Post-Match Reflections: Steve Kerr stated, 'We gotta respond. We need to practice tomorrow. We gotta execute better. We had 13 turnovers in the first half. We were completely disorganized. That's where I feel like we need the most work.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cleveland Cavaliers improved to 10-0 with the win over the Golden State Warriors.
Others: The Golden State Warriors will face the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday.
Arena conditions or unusual events affec: The game was played at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse.
Historical comparisons or records beyond: The Cleveland Cavaliers entered the game with a franchise-best 9-0 record.
Notable head-to-head statistics or uniqu: This was the first meeting between the two teams this season.
Opponent's performance: The Cleveland Cavaliers dominated the game, leading by 41 points at halftime.
Bright spots for the losing team: Jonathan Kuminga scored 21 points off the bench for the Golden State Warriors, and Brandin Podziemski added 14 points off the bench.
